name: Stargazing 64
description:
Gaze at the stars while experiencing Astromegalophobia first-hand in this N64 styled cosmic horror game.

     

This game was created in a few hours as an exercise to recreate the iconic N64 look. 

   

Attribution:

Font: Zombified by Sinister Fonts

Font: Creato Display by Lafontype
